name: Arthur Abon
text: You guys are rays of sunshine aren't you? Lels.    I am waiting for a betting pool to start on how soon nuclear apocalypse begins.

source_obj.text: You guys are rays of sunshine aren't you? Lels.    I am waiting for a betting pool to start on how soon nuclear apocalypse begins.

replies.text: The Fallout series is probably my most favorite games of all time, but the least ones i'd like to happen in real life. 😰
